lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said that the Islamic law student was beaten to death in an attack that was set off by a false accusation that she had burned a copy of the Quran.

headline.print_headline: Trial Starts in Killing of Afghan Woman
headline.main: Afghanistan Begins Trial in Killing of Woman

snippet: Prosecutors said that the Islamic law student was beaten to death in an attack that was set off by a false accusation that she had burned a copy of the Quran.
abstract: Trial of 49 suspects in mob killing of Afghan woman Farkhunda begins in Kabul; Farkhunda was fatally beaten after being accused of burning copy of Quran.
